Hi there, thanks for stopping by. My name is Jimmy Dempsey and I am a 25 year old web developer and front-end architect from Fairfax, VA based in Orlando, FL.

I work as a UX/UI developer and Web Performance Lead for Cru, one of the largest non-profit organizations in the United States, at their headquarters in Florida.

I specialize in writing personalized code for websites and web apps, with a focus on CSS, HTML, Javascript for creating powerful web solutions. I love interacting with many different web technologies. Currently I am playing with Ruby, Jekyll and SASS Mixins

SmartClickr

SmartClickr, a project I built with 3 classmates in 2013, is an all-in-one audience response system build to help facilitate better communication with a speaker and audience members. It is a web app built to run on any internet connected device. It is super easy and fun to use and it is built on Node.js so it is lighting quick. The responses from the audience grow on charts in real-time. You should really check it out.

Contact

If you would like to chat feel free to send me an email. It is my goal to respond to every email I receive, but if it takes me a while to respond don't hesitate to follow up.

You can also send me a tweet if you like. I am currently accepting freelance work on a case-by-case basis.
